title: Enterprise AI Systems Architecture (Build 1)
summary: A reference architecture for secure, governable, and cost-controlled enterprise AI using Azure OpenAI, Entra ID, managed identities, network controls, observability, and explicit cost guardrails.

title: Training Video to Multi-Format Learning Materials
summary: Turn a recorded knowledge-transfer session into a training guide, quick-reference sheet, and onboarding checklist.

title: Photo Restoration and Enhancement (Fun Project using ChatGPT and Nano Banana)
summary: Restore clarity, sharpen colors, preserve borders, and manage composition in aged photos.

title: RAG on Personal Knowledge (PoC)
summary: Lightweight vector store with guardrails to safely query private notes, sermons, and slides.
